name: Life Is Nuclear - LD41
description:
Life is Nuclear

A broken game about Life, Guns and Ascii ...

Play the unholy mix between a top down shooter and a story driven game with IBM compliant graphics.

Features state of the art graphics, meaningful choices, random generation, 30 seconds of music, about 4 different guns, rewind time mechanics and tons of screen shake.

Each of your actions will have consequences ...

( This game is not endorsed by either Vlambeer nor Dontnod Entertainment and is pure parody work)

This game was created for the 41th Ludum Dare (Compo) in 48h. The theme was "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres"

Made with Game Maker Studio 2
